United Kingdom Overseas Territory. The British Antarctic Territory consists of all land, islands and ice shelves south of latitude 60°S between longitude 20°W and 80°W.
The British Indian Ocean Territory consists of the Chagos Archipelago, including Diego Garcia.

United Kingdom Overseas Territory. Do not confuse the British Virgin Islands with the United States Virgin Islands: 'Virgin Islands' should therefore not be used wherever there may be ambiguity. The Islands have normally been called the British Virgin Islands since 1917 when the Danish West Indies were acquired by the United States and named the US Virgin Islands.
